name: Mega-pixel Meltdown (Love Jam 2)
description:
The file below is basically just a demo made for Love Jam 2 in 2014. Don't look at the code, it's a nightmare of hackery.

Screenshots are from the full game, which should be coming soon. :) ha ha maybe someday

April 2018 update: Sorry, but I have to hide the .love file as it will longer work with Löve 0.11.0.
